summary:
Two ENB presets.
ENBSeries version is also OK by something latest.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][youtube]XWzDy0HdqEE[/youtube]        
   [/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]    [color=#ff7700]   Thank you very much viewing this mod!

[/color][/size][/font][color=#ff7700][size=4]     This is two ENB preset.Meiko ENB and Hana ENB.
[/size]    [size=4]
     It is by default a hue of the fantasy.
     The color is strong, and there is the light and shade, too.And it is slightly real.
     Bright indoor and the night when it is not too dark.
[/size]       [/color][size=4][color=#ff7700]By oneself, coordinate the preference Please.[/color]

[b][size=3][color=#c27ba0] [/color][/size][/b][/size][color=#add8e6][size=6][b][size=3]   [color=#00ff00]Confirmation and sometimes editing:[/color] 
[/size][/b][/size][/color][color=#add8e6][size=6][b][size=3]   1.Disable "Antialiasing" and "Anisotropic filtering" in the SkyrimLauncher options. Not doing so will disable some 
     ENB effects.
[/size][/b][/size][/color][size=6][b][size=3][color=#add8e6]   2.Document/My Games/skyrim[/color]
[color=#add8e6]     SkyrimPrefs.ini[/color]
[color=#add8e6]    [Display][/color]
[color=#add8e6]   bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 [/color]
[color=#add8e6]   bDrawLandShadows=1[/color]
[color=#add8e6]   bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/color]
[color=#add8e6]   bShadowsOnGrass=1[/color]
[color=#add8e6]   iMultiSample=0 [/color]
[color=#add8e6]   bFXAAEnabled=0[/color]
[color=#3c78d8]   [/color][color=#9fc5e8] [/color][/size][/b][/size][b][size=3][color=#9fc5e8]To confirm[/color][size=4][color=#9fc5e8]from[/color][color=#cfe2f3] a URL.[/color][/size][size=4] [/size][url=http://enbdev.com/][color=#ff0000]http://enbdev.com/[/color][/url][size=4] [/size][color=#cfe2f3](News-Download is left column -TES Skyrim is bottom)[/color][/size][/b][color=#add8e6][size=6][b][size=3]
   3.If, during a play, CTD comes to be outstanding
      enblocal.ini
     [MEMORY]
   ReservedMemorySizeMb=64 ... (256,512,1024)
   For video cards with 2GB or more VRAM, 512 is a good baseline. For less VRAM, 256 can work better.
   VideoMemorySizeMb=0 ... change to your VRAM size. (512,1024,2048...)
   This setting should be set according to the available VRAM. 
[/size][/b][size=4][color=#ea9999]
[/color][/size][color=#ea9999][font=Tahoma]  [size=5][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][b]For better visuals[/b][/size][/font] (MOD which I use)[/size][/font][/color][/size][/color][color=#add8e6][size=6]  
[/size][/color][color=#e06666]     Relighting Skyrim
[size=4]    [/size]Enhanced Lighting for ENB (ELE) - LITE [size=4]
[/size][size=3]　 Vivid Weathers - a complete Weather and Visual overhaul for Skyrim
    -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/size][size=6]  [/size][size=3]Relighting Skyrim
[/size][size=3]    [/size]Enhanced Lights and FX[size=3]
[/size]    Climates Of Tamriel -Weather-Lighting-Audio[/color][color=#ea9999][size=4]
[/size][color=#add8e6][size=6]  [/size][/color][/color][size=3] [/size][color=#add8e6][color=#ea9999]   [/color]Pay attention to the compatibility
